text.section: The Registry shall consist of a secure, electronic database to which authorized access is available 24 hours per day, 7 days per week.

The Secretary shall specify in regulations the persons who are authorized to access the Registry, including:
The registrant or the registrant's designee; and
Representatives of a health care facility in which a registrant is receiving health care.
The Secretary shall adopt regulations regarding access to the Registry, including procedures to protect confidential information.
The Department may perform evaluations of the Registry.
